1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 from sht31_driver import SHT31
4 
5 import rospy
6 from sht31.msg import sht31_data
7 from std_msgs.msg import Header
8 
9 sensor = SHT31(0x44)
10 
11 
12 def publisher():
13  pub = rospy.Publisher('rov/sht31', sht31_data, queue_size=3)
14  rospy.init_node('sht31')
15  rate = rospy.Rate(3) #3Hz data read
16 
17  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
18  msg = sht31_data()
19  header = Header()
20 
21  sensor.updateValues()
22 
23  msg.tempC = sensor.getTempuratureC()
24  msg.tempF = sensor.getTempuratureF()
25  msg.humidity = sensor.getHumidity()
26 
27  #update message headers
28  header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
29  header.frame_id = 'humidity_data'
30  msg.header = header
31 
32  pub.publish(msg)
33 
34  rate.sleep()
35 
36 if __name__ == '__main__':
37  try:
38  publisher()
39  except rospy.ROSInterruptException:
40  pass
